text: Nilson Taty Sousa Vaz (born 15 November 1987), simply known as Nilson, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Sporting Praia Cruz and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Nilson made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2011. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Sporting Praia Cruz players
title: Nilson (footballer)
